section.title: Modifying a Query
section.para:
There are two ways of modifying Queries existing Query Mapping XML file.
Modification through Query Test Editor
Modification through Query Manager Editor

note.title: Note : In an environment where Proxy server is used, it is needed to register Proxy server in Eclipse to use Query Test Editor.

section.title: Modification through Query Test Editor
section.para: For Query statement modification through Query Test Editor, execute Context Menu of Query ID at Query Explorer View. To modify Query statement at the executed Query Test Editor, follow Adding Query statement utilizing Query Test Editor.

section.title: Modification through Query Manager Editor
section.para: Modification of Query statement through Query Manager Editor is similar to adding Query statement except that it edits the existing Query statement. For more details, see Adding Query statement through Query Manager Editor..
